Interface PlayerDAO

  • Method Details

    • getAllPlayers

      List<Player> getAllPlayers()
      Retrieves a list of all players.
      Returns:
      a list of all Player objects.

    • getPlayerById

      Player getPlayerById(String id)
      Retrieves a player by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the player.
      Returns:
      the Player object with the specified ID, or null if no such player exists.

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a new player.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be added.

    • updatePlayer

      void updatePlayer(Player player)
      Updates an existing player.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object with updated information.

    • deletePlayer

      void deletePlayer(String id)
      Deletes a player by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the player to be deleted.

    • isPlayerNameTaken

      boolean isPlayerNameTaken(String playerName)
      Checks if a player name is already taken.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the player name is already taken, false otherwise.
